original: 毌丘儉之亂，匹馬入數千騎中，輒殺傷百餘人，如此者六七...[正史] 具體記述「力敵萬人」者，只此一例。或勝呂布、趙雲？
text: In Wuqiujian's chaos, horses were driven into thousands of rides, killing more than a hundred people, such as six or seven... [正史] This is the only example of a specific description of 'strength against ten thousand people.' Or Sheng Lu Bu, Zhao Yun?
